title.rendered: Submission to the prebudget consultation presented to Finance Canada

content.rendered: The federal Budget is arguably the most important area to instigate change at a country’s level. As the voice of green building in Canada, CAGBC supports progressive initiatives and brings research evidence into policy to facilitate the decarbonization of Canadian buildings. To help sustain momentum and further our zero-carbon building transition, CAGBC’s Advocacy team made recommendations ahead of the 2023 prebudget consultation.
